# isInspectable

**Instance Property**

Determines whether Web Inspector can inspect the [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] instances for this context.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isInspectable: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

A context can control multiple [doc://com.apple.webkit/documentation/WebKit/WKWebView] instances, from the background content, to the popover.

You should set this to `YES` when needed for debugging purposes. The default value is `NO`.
title: isInspectable
